author: Reuters Editorial
title: Germania, export e import in calo 0,5% su mese a gennaio Macroeconomia
text: BERLIN, March 9 (Reuters) - Germany's Federal Statistics Office on Friday reported the following preliminary economic data. Figures are in billions of euros : GERMAN TRADE (ADJUSTED) JAN 18 DEC 17 JAN 17 Trade balance 21.3 21.3 18.7 Exports 111.0 111.5 103.4 Exports pct change m/m -0.5 unch +2.0 Imports 89.7 90.2 84.7 Imports pct change m/m -0.5 +1.1 +2.4 GERMAN TRADE (UNADJUSTED) JAN 18 DEC 17 JAN 17 Trade balance 17.4 18.1 14.6 Current account 22.0 28.8 11.9 Exports 107.1 100.6 98.6 Imports 89.7 82.5 84.0 Goods 19.6 18.5 15.7 Services -0.4 3.7 -1.0 Primary income 7.6 11.7 6.9 Secondary income -4.9 -5.0 -9.7 (Reporting by Berlin Newsroom) nB4N1PQ00A
